reviewText: This is a classic! Reminds me of Oceans Eleven, but instead of eleven dudes there are only three..and instead of George you have Mario Almada. Instead of robbing a casino for money, they rob a race track for a horse..well maybe its not like Oceans Eleven..hmmm..what was I on?? Anyhow, this is a good movie. DVD is great, good audio but don't expect any dvd extras, all you get is scene selection and play movie.
